record.description: University of Chicago Track Team, 1922. Fifth row: A. A. Stagg (coach); fourth row: T. Eck, J. S. Masek, W. A. Dawson, O. R. Robert, H. C. Spruth, S. B. Bisno, R. Davis, and N. B. Johnson; third row: H. G. Frieda, J. M. Pyott, and M. A. Bowers; second row: H. L. Michael, L. R. Dooley, C. M. Redmon (captain), R. B. MacFarlane, and C. L. Brickman; first row: A. W. Brickman, E. E. Krogh, B. B. Hall, and A. J. Jones.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
